name: aws-http-serverless-to-server
description: Runs your AWS HTTP Lambdas on lightweight and fast Express.js server environment with just one function.

scripts.readme: sh ./bin/create-readme.sh -a false -c false -l false -m true && cat README.md > README.tmp && node ./readme/readmePrefix && cat README.tmp >> README.md && rm -f README.tmp
scripts.docs: npm run readme && npm run doctoc
scripts.compodoc: sh ./bin/run-unit-tests-if-coverage-not-exits.sh && npm run docs && sh -c 'rm -r -f -d documentation' && compodoc -s -w -p tsconfig.json --theme laravel --disableTemplateTab --disableRoutesGraph --disableLifeCycleHooks --disableDomTree --disableStyleTab --hideGenerator --customLogo readme/veolia.png --customFavicon readme/favicon.ico --includes readme --assetsFolder readme/images --unitTestCoverage coverage/coverage-summary.json
scripts.compodoc:build: sh ./bin/run-unit-tests-if-coverage-not-exits.sh && npm run docs && sh -c 'rm -r -f -d documentation' && compodoc -p tsconfig.json --theme laravel --disableTemplateTab --disableRoutesGraph --disableLifeCycleHooks --disableDomTree --disableStyleTab --hideGenerator --customLogo readme/veolia.png --customFavicon readme/favicon.ico --includes readme --assetsFolder readme/images --unitTestCoverage coverage/coverage-summary.json

author: Jens Krefeldt <jens.krefeldt@veolia.com> (https://github.com/deadratfink)
